job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Job Description
Machine Learning Engineer in Atlanta, GA 30092
Interview Logistics
Video
Required Skills Set
Years of Experience:
5+ years
Education Required:
Bachelors Degree or equivalent work experience
Machine Learning
The position will require the candidate has experience with Machine Learning strategy, data preparation, visualization, splitting, modeling, and model deployments.
SQL
Writing efficient queries sourced from restful internal/external APIs, MS SQL Servers, Oracle, and Teradata sources.
Python
Data analysis
MSSQL Server
ETL Skills, SSIS
C#
Nice To Have Skills
Additional Preferred Skills:
Min.io
Tableau
Multi-Platform Machine Learning (Microsoft Azure, Google AI, open-source Client platforms)
C# Machine Learning Libraries experience (Client.net, and extensions)
C# MVC
Java
Microsoft Powershell
EssBase Automation
Project Description
We are looking for a Machine Learning (Client) Engineer to help us create business intelligence products that support financial and technical objectives. Machine Learning Engineer responsibilities include staging and cleaning data, developing machine learning models, maintaining Client systems, and occasionally presenting findings to executives. To do this job successfully, you need exceptional skills in statistics and programming. This team member will be working with subject matter experts in Accounting, Marketing, Engineering, and Finance.
Physical Environment And Working Conditions
Remote until covid restrictions are lifted.
